mapper.select: select t.plandetailid,t.planname from b_planfile_inplan t left join b_planfile_detail bpd on bpd.plandetailid=t.plandetailid where 1=1 and bpd.grainid=#{grainid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
select t.storageid "storageid", t.storagename "storagename", t.defgrainid "defgrainid" from l_storage t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select t.contractid "contractid", t.contractno "contractno" from b_contract t where 1=1 and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.buysellflag=#{buysellflag} and t.conttypeid=#{conttypeid} and t.contractno=#{contractno} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.tradartiperson=#{tradartiperson} and t.corpartiperson=#{corpartiperson} and t.tqty=#{tqty} and t.kgqty=#{kgqty} and t.tprice=#{tprice} and t.kgprice=#{kgprice} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.execqty=#{execqty} and t.exectqty=#{exectqty} and t.bailpert=#{bailpert} and t.bailrate=#{bailrate} and t.bailamt=#{bailamt} and t.gqrequire=#{gqrequire} and t.partyaagent=#{partyaagent} and t.partybagent=#{partybagent} and t.partyabanknum=#{partyabanknum} and t.partybbanknum=#{partybbanknum} and t.filenamelist=#{filenamelist} and t.bidno=#{bidno} and t.handlingpert=#{handlingpert} and t.handlingamt=#{handlingamt} and t.signdate=#{signdate} and t.execdate=#{execdate} and t.completed=#{completed} and t.signaddress=#{signaddress} and t.honouraddress=#{honouraddress} and t.honourstate=#{honourstate} and t.honourbegindate=#{honourbegindate} and t.honourenddate=#{honourenddate} and t.stopflag=#{stopflag} and t.stopfile=#{stopfile} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spstatus=#{spstatus} and t.spremark=#{spremark}
